com.trogdadr2tr.socket

Class ClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.trogdadr2tr.socket.ClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameListener, ClientListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class ClientConnection
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ClientListener, GameListener
    Handles all communication with the client.
    Author:
    Colt Rogness
